verses.verse: <S%H8199>Judge<s%> me, O <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H7378>plead<s%> my <S%H7379>cause<s%> against an <S%H3808>ungodly<s%> <S%H2623><s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%>: O <S%H6403>deliver<s%> me from the <S%H4820>deceitful<s%> and <S%H5766>unjust<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>. ungodly: or, unmerciful the deceitful: Heb. a man of deceit and iniquity

For thou art the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H4581>strength<s%>: why dost thou cast me <S%H2186>off<s%>? why <S%H1980>go<s%> I <S%H6937>mourning<s%> because of the <S%H3906>oppression<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy<s%>?

O send <S%H7971>out<s%> thy <S%H216>light<s%> and thy <S%H571>truth<s%>: let them <S%H5148>lead<s%> me; let them <S%H935>bring<s%> me unto thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>hill<s%>, and to thy <S%H4908>tabernacles<s%>.

Then will I <S%H935>go<s%> unto the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, unto <S%H410>God<s%> my <S%H8057>exceeding<s%> <S%H1524>joy<s%>: yea, upon the <S%H3658>harp<s%> will I <S%H3034>praise<s%> thee, O <S%H430>God<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>. my exceeding: Heb. the gladness of my joy

Why art thou cast <S%H7817>down<s%>, O my <S%H5315>soul<s%>? and why art thou <S%H1993>disquieted<s%> within me? <S%H3176>hope<s%> in <S%H430>God<s%>: for I shall yet <S%H3034>praise<s%> him, who is the <S%H3444>health<s%> of my <S%H6440>countenance<s%>, and my <S%H430>God<s%>.
